long: Mean, nasty, and scummy are synonyms of despicable, but they don't fully convey the awfulness of despicable. A man who lies to get a promotion meant for his co-worker would be considered mean. But the despicable man ā the one who is so awful and worthless that he deserves to be despised ā is the one who burns down the office building and frames his co-worker for it.
